author: Ryan Daws
description:
It looks like the DMA is finally making things a bit easier for Apple users trying to install the Epic Games Store on iOS in the EU. Thanks to pressure from the DMA (Digital Markets Act) in the EU, Apple rolled out an update in July with iOS 18.6 that appears to have made a […]

The post Epic Games Store iOS installs soar as DMA pressures Apple in EU appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Epic Games Store iOS installs soar as DMA pressures Apple in EU
